author: GoPro
description:
Fly in, drop in, repeat 🔁 @cmh_heli Purcell is the company’s only day heli-skiing destination. Just two hours from Banff, Alberta, and based in the mountain town of Golden, BC, Purcell is an easy add-on to any British Columbia ski vacation or Powder Highway road trip. With unlimited runs and massive terrain included, this is heli nirvana without the pressure of counting vertical. This CMH experience is all about more snow, more laps, and more freedom—captured by GoPro from lift-off to last lap.

Featuring: Travis Rice, Sammy Carlson, Kai Jones

--------------------------------------------------------
